question: 1. Select the most appropriate ANTONYM of the underlined word. My energy (waned) to see my college team performing poorly in the match. (24 July, 2023)
2. She is a (veteran) journalist known for her powerful writing style. (24 July, 2023)

5. Henry is so (servile) that other people take
advantage of him. (24 July, 2023)
6. Her dog can climb (under) the fence.

word (‘Optimistic’) from the given sentence.

 (26 July, 2023)

117. God has clearly (blessed) human beings for

128. The WHO issued a statement on Sunday

word (‘polite’) in the given sentence. The rude

149. The money she offered him was insufficient
